config.@MinervaAlwaysShowLanguageButton: Whether to show the language switcher button even if no languages are available for the page.
config.@MFStripResponsiveImages: Whether to strip 'srcset' attributes from all images on mobile renderings. This is a sort of brute-force bandwidth optimization at the cost of making images fuzzier on most devices.
config.@MFResponsiveImageWhitelist: Whitelist of source file mime types to retain srcset attributes on when using $wgMFStripResponsiveImages. Defaults to allow rasterized SVGs since they usually are diagrams that compress well and benefit from the higher resolution.
